details: Added Xcode to the list of supported platforms for Copilot Code Review.
Included detailed Xcode usage instructions: review initiation via chat window, change selection, and comment navigation.
Added two new images (`xcode-ccr-button.png`, `xcode-review-popup.png`) for Xcode UI guidance.
Updated environment switching references from "tool switcher" to "appropriate tab" across docs.
Removed redundant VS Code version note and generalized output formatting descriptions.
